casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terry Alvin HYATT. No. 402A00-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 15, 2005. Faith S. Bushnaq, for Terry Alvin Hyatt. Valerie B. Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ronald K. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of July 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Terry Alvin Hyatt) shall have up to and including the 9th day of September 2005 to file and serve his/her Petition for Writ of Certiorari with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of July 2005."
